title: Part 1 Chapter 10
content:
I love You, You know that?

 I know you do. And I love you.

book.title: 与神对话 Conversations With God
book.description: 简介： Conversations with God (CwG) is a sequence of books written by Neale Donald Walsch, written as a dialogue in which Walsch asks questions and God answers.The first book of the Conversations with God series, Conversations with God, Book 1: An ...
